name: NoteAble
body: ### Ear training made simple Simple, interactive, portable, ear training. With regular use of NoteAble, you will be able to clearly distinguish notes on the guitar. NoteAble is catered to those learning guitar but it can also great for anyone looking to train their ear! The hope with NoteAble is to help students and lovers of music build a foundation upon which they can improve their musical intuition. When you have a strong foundation, you will find your musical talents can reach truly amazing heights. ### Download You can download NoteAble today for Android on Google Play for free! ### Contact Marco Suson GitHub: [@msuson](https://github.com/msuson) email: masuson117@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
